instructions: 直走經過右手邊的Abstract Group、Vicon，約 2 個攤位。
目的地就在前方的 CAMPUS VFX | LOST BOYS VANCOUVER。

target_info.display_name: CAMPUS VFX | LOST BOYS VANCOUVER: CAMPUS VFX | LOST BOYS VANCOUVER

companies.name: CAMPUS VFX | LOST BOYS VANCOUVER
companies.description: Campus VFX | Lost Boys Vancouver is a specialized visual effects school in Canada, offering accelerated, hands-on diploma programs in VFX compositing, effects technical direction, and digital lighting. The school focuses on industry-ready training, mentorship, and project-based learning, preparing students for careers in film, television, and digital media.
companies.categories: 3D Modeling, Animation/Film, Education/Training, Rendering & Modeling, Visual Effects Software
